Package devops.project

Class DataFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • devops.project.DataFrame
  • public class DataFrame
extends java.lang.Object
    The DataFrame class represents a data frame where each column is a list of values. It provides methods for data manipulation, selection, and printing.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DataFrame​(java.lang.String fileName)
      Constructs a DataFrame from a CSV file.
      DataFrame​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> data)
      Constructs a DataFrame from a map of column names and their corresponding data.

      Returns the columns of the DataFrame.

      int getRowSize()

      Returns a new DataFrame containing the specified cell or row/column.

      Returns a new DataFrame containing the specified rows and columns.

      Prints the DataFrame to the console.

      Prints the first n lines of the DataFrame to the console.

      Prints the last n lines of the DataFrame to the console.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataFrame

        public DataFrame​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> data)
        Constructs a DataFrame from a map of column names and their corresponding data.
        Parameters:
        data - A map where the key is the column name and the value is a list of data for that column.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the data is null or empty.

      • DataFrame

        public DataFrame​(java.lang.String fileName)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a DataFrame from a CSV file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the CSV file to read.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while reading the file.

      • iloc

        public DataFrame iloc​(int rowStart,
                      int rowEnd,
                      int colStart,
                      int colEnd)
        Returns a new DataFrame containing the specified rows and columns.
        Parameters:
        rowStart - The starting index of the rows to select.
        rowEnd - The ending index of the rows to select.
        colStart - The starting index of the columns to select.
        colEnd - The ending index of the columns to select.
        Returns:
        A new DataFrame containing the selected rows and columns.

      • iloc

        public DataFrame iloc​(int rowIndex,
                      int colIndex)
        Returns a new DataFrame containing the specified cell or row/column.
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - The index of the row to select.
        colIndex - The index of the column to select.
        Returns:
        A new DataFrame containing the selected cell or row/column.

      • getCell

        public DataFrame getCell​(int rowIndex,
                         int colIndex)
        Returns a new DataFrame containing the specified cell.
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - The index of the row to select.
        colIndex - The index of the column to select.
        Returns:
        A new DataFrame containing the selected cell.

      • selectByName

        public DataFrame selectByName​(java.lang.String... names)
        Returns a new DataFrame containing the specified columns by their names.
        Parameters:
        names - The names of the columns to select.
        Returns:
        A new DataFrame containing the selected columns.
